revised_title: Gascoigne's Invention of Telescopic Sights and Micrometer
tldr: The article discusses the contributions of Mr. Gascoigne in the field of astronomy, particularly his invention of telescopic sights and the micrometer. It highlights how Gascoigne's inventions were used in quadrants and sextants, enabling more precise measurements in astronomy. The article also mentions the support and admiration Gascoigne received from fellow astronomers, such as Mr. Crabtrie and Mr. Horrox.
